content.question: Which of the following is an example of the process of cogeneration?

choices.label: Using timber waste products as biofuel
Using wastewater from electricity production for heating homes
Using the corn crops for ethanol fuel production
Using the reservoir behind a hydroelectric dam for recreation

content.answer: Using wastewater from electricity production for heating homes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
